MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-JAN-2021 09:48.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach affecting properties in Elworth Road, Ruscoe Avenue, Moston Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 5:59am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:08am on 20th January 2021
